  • Mission Statement
  • Founder
  • Meet the Team

  • Our Vision is to make zero waste shopping easy and affordable with sustainable choices the most convenient choice. We supply high quality reusable and sustainable products along with refillable products from suppliers who share the same values as we do.

    Our mission is to inspire and educate while providing an enjoyable and non-judgemental shopping experience. We are a more than profit company who is dedicated to giving back to our local community and local charities.

    We may be small fish in the big pond of sustainability, however together with all of the other independent zero waste shops we are making a big difference.
